WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Arcane Eye
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You create an invisible, magical eye within range that hovers in the air for the duration.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Banishment
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Black Tentacles
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on the ground that you can see within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Blight
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Confusion
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled action.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Conjure Minor Elementals
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You summon elementals that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Control Water
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Dimension Door
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Fabricate
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You convert raw materials into products of the same material.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Faithful Hound
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Fire Shield
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: Thin and wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Greater Invisibility
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Ice Storm
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Locate Creature
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Phantasmal Killer
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Polymorph
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Private Sanctum
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You make an area within range magically secure.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Resilient Sphere
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: A sphere of shimmering force encloses a creature or object of Large size or smaller within range.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Secret Chest
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You hide a chest, and all its contents, on the Ethereal Plane.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Stone Shape
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Stoneskin
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone.

WizardLevel4Spells.Name: Wall of Fire
WizardLevel4Spells.Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range.
